job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ulliThorough command of both the Windows and Linux Operating Systems with strong background in troubleshooting eitherliliKnowledge of native Kubernetes or related enterprise container platforms such as Open ShiftliliGood understanding of the mechanics of this platform and the deployment pipeline that feeds itliliKnowledge of Public Cloud Governance frameworks architectures configurations services and solutions specifically within Microsoft Azure but may also include AWS and GCPliliKnowledge in core Azure services like Azure Kubernetes Service CosmoDB Azure Functions Azure Storage Entities and Concepts Azure CLI and Powershell CmdletsliliKnowledge in Azure organizational entities such as Departments Accounts Subscriptions Resource Groups and Management GroupsliulpbrppuSkillsupulliFast learner proactive thinkerliliAbility to innovate automate and continually improve processesliliExcellent verbal and written communication skillsliliPossess critical thinking and analytical skillsliliCapacity to take initiative desire to become a selfstarterliulpbrp
